org.contentmine.cproject.args

Interface AbstractTool

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAMISearchTool, AbstractAMITool, AMIAssertTool, AMICleanTool, AMIDisplayTool, AMIDownloadTool, AMIDummyTool, AMIFigureTool, AMIFilterTool, AMIForestPlot, AMIForestPlotTool, AMIGetpapersTool, AMIGraphicsTool, AMIGrobidTool, AMIImageProcessor, AMIImageTool, AMILuceneTool, AMIMakeProjectTool, AMIMetadataTool, AMIOCRTool, AMIPDFTool, AMIPixelTool, AMIRegexTool, AMIRegexTool, AMISearchTool, AMISectionTool, AMISummaryTool, AMISVGTool, AMITableTool, AMITransformTool, AMIWordsTool

    public interface AbstractTool
    for communication between Tool family and ArgProcessor objects. ArgProcessors provide functionality for some tools, especially Words and Search Messy , since retrofitted
    Author:
    pm286
